London (UK) and Boston (US). Graduates and interns please!

We're a 100-person financial-software firm committed to learning and improvement as well as great web software and agile development. Some of you may know us from our sponsorship of Hacker News meetups in London. We're focussed on hiring graduate developers and interns at the moment. See http://devblog.timgroup.com and http://www.timgroup.com/careers.

Note we recently changed our name from youDevise to TIMGroup but we're still the same folks!
